channel.title: Posts on My blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My blog

item.title: Spring doesn’t stop by anymore
item.description: I walk the same streets, without hope. Hope to see you, a passing glance, my game of chance.

item.title: Loving/Leaving
item.description: It’s easier to miss people than loving them I give away goodbyes like candy on halloween

item.title: October evenings
item.description: These days I don’t count the cups of coffee as my memories melt into daydreams

item.title: Midnight Express
item.description: There’s a loneliness in the city Its corners too big to fit me

item.title: Carousel
item.description: We were paper boats In water, running Delicate, just a brisk breeze away
